title: Citi Pakistan: The Only Bank Powering Payments to More Than 50 Online Partners
summary: As Citi Pakistan celebrates 50 years (1961-2011), it reiterates its commitment to developing its state-of-the-art online banking platform – Citibank Online (www.citibank.com.pk). Citibank is the only bank in Pakistan to join hands with a diverse range of 59 online service providers (and growing), including clubs, schools, universities, internet service providers, utility bill payments, charities and more. Citibank has also introduced the first ever online food order and delivery system in Pakistan as part of its online banking offering.
tag-1: Citi Pakistan: The Only Bank Powering Payments to More Than 50 Online Partners
tag-2: As Citi Pakistan celebrates 50 years (1961-2011), it reiterates its commitment to developing its state-of-the-art online banking platform – Citibank Online (www.citibank.com.pk). Citibank is the only bank in Pakistan to join hands with a diverse range of 59 online service providers (and growing), including clubs, schools, universities, internet service providers, utility bill payments, charities and more. Citibank has also introduced the first ever online food order and delivery system in Pakistan as part of its online banking offering.
tag-3: Head of Electronic Channels and Liabilities Huma Gailani said: "Every day we continue to invest in our online banking platform and add to our list service providers to whom our customers can make online payments. Our business focus lies in generating awareness and educating our valued customers regarding the facilities available via Citibank Online, and we have undertaken targeted online marketing campaigns to cascade this message. This is the first step in our aim to introduce the Pakistani market to a new genre of banking."
tag-4: Sheharyar Khurram Butt, Internet Banking Head for Citi Pakistan, said, "Citibank's focus has always been to provide a superior banking experience for its customer base. It is in line with this client excellence model that Citibank aims to enhance convenience, security and comfort for its stakeholders by enabling online payments and effectively bringing the bank home."
tag-5: With Citibank Online, customers can now avail a range of banking facilities with just a click, from the convenience of their home and workplace. Among other online payment features, Citibank Online allows you to transfer funds to Citibank customers instantly, across 23 different countries, order checkbooks and issue pay orders and demand drafts.
tag-6: "Our focus is increasingly tilting towards our online banking offering, as we continue partnering with numerous service providers that are relevant to our customer base. With this we hope to take customer convenience and the banking experience to an entirely new level," said Aliuddin Ahmed, Citi Pakistan Consumer Banking Head.
tag-7: As Citi celebrates 50 years in Pakistan this year, it continues to focus on its pioneering digital banking initiatives. For a current list of online service providers to whom you can make payments, you can visit www.citibank.com.pk.
tag-8: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management. Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com.
